infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: CleanSpace needs access to your photo library to help you organize and clean up duplicate photos, large files, and screenshots to free up storage space.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: CleanSpace needs permission to save optimized photos back to your library after compression.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: CleanSpace may use your camera to capture new photos.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow CleanSpace to access your photos to analyze and help you clean up duplicates, large files, and screenshots.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow CleanSpace to save optimized photos to your library.
